entry.title: For Sunlight
entry.summary:
Author: QKkr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,276Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: An AU where Clark Kent is not yet Superman and is faced with human problems like paying rent in time. After all what's the point of being able to fly if you can't even afford to buy groceries.
